scenes.background: [Bob] leans back in his chair, arms crossed.
scenes.description: 'Sure, voting is fair, but what if some people still aren't happy?'

options.text: We can always have a backup plan to address any strong objections.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the potential issue and suggested a proactive solution, showing good perception and empathy but moderate social skills and self-regulation.

options.text: It's impossible to make everyone happy, but at least voting gives everyone a voice.
options.analysis: You recognized the fairness of voting, showing good self-regulation and social skills, but empathy was lower.

options.text: If people are strongly against certain options, we might need to rethink our approach.
options.analysis: You pointed out a potential flaw in the voting process, showing good perception and motivation but lower social skills.
